lines.text:
[Trying to calm Edgar down after he has inadvertently thrown the building inspector out the door]
Now, Edgar... now, Edgar... just calm down, dear... now, there you are... If you'll be nice and don't lose your temper, we'll all pitch in and help you rebuild that chimney.

[Still angry and frustrated]
Well, there isn't gonna be any chimney! in fact, there isn't gonna be any fireplace!

[Tittering]
Aw, Edgar, there has to be! How is Santa Claus gonna get in at Christmas?

[He shakes his head impatiently]
Hasn't your mother ever told you?
That there ain't no Santa Claus!
